channel.title: .appimage instillation issues..
channel.description:
Hi ya..
I'm trying to install the .appimage of Atomic wallet and Ledger live in Whonix but both dont want to load even after giving them access rights to execute..would this be due to Whonix running through the Tor network(read on another forum that Ledger live is hit and miss with running through the Tor network) as I have two other .appimage programs running perfectly with no issues at all?
Thank you for any help you can offer..
Cheers

Hi ya…

I’m trying to install the .appimage of Atomic wallet and Ledger live in Whonix but both dont want to load even after giving them access rights to execute…would this be due to Whonix running through the Tor network(read on another forum that Ledger live is hit and miss with running through the Tor network) as I have two other .appimage programs running perfectly with no issues at all?
